name: GetZoomMeetingDetails
description:
Retrieve details of a specified Zoom meeting.

Call this tool to get information about a specific Zoom meeting, such as its host and scheduled times. Ensure the host has a Zoom Meetings Basic license or higher.

parameters.name: zoom_meeting_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Zoom meeting. Ensure it is stored as a long format integer due to potential lengths over 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can be more than 10 digits.

parameters.name: meeting_occurrence_id
parameters.description: The ID of a specific occurrence of a recurring Zoom meeting. This is needed to retrieve details for that particular occurrence.

value_schema.description: Meeting occurrence ID. Provide this field to view meeting details of a particular occurrence of the [recurring meeting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/214973206-Scheduling-Recurring-Meetings).

parameters.name: show_previous_occurrences
parameters.description: Set to true to view details of all previous occurrences of a recurring meeting.

value_schema.description: Set this field's value to `true` to view meeting details of all previous occurrences of a [recurring meeting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/214973206-Scheduling-Recurring-Meetings).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: occurrence_id
parameters.description: Meeting occurrence ID. Provide this field to view meeting details of a particular occurrence of the [recurring meeting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/214973206-Scheduling-Recurring-Meetings).

value_schema.description: Meeting occurrence ID. Provide this field to view meeting details of a particular occurrence of the [recurring meeting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/214973206-Scheduling-Recurring-Meetings).

parameters.name: show_previous_occurrences
parameters.description: Set this field's value to `true` to view meeting details of all previous occurrences of a [recurring meeting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/214973206-Scheduling-Recurring-Meetings).

value_schema.description: Set this field's value to `true` to view meeting details of all previous occurrences of a [recurring meeting](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/214973206-Scheduling-Recurring-Meetings).

parameters.name: meetingId
parameters.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can be more than 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can be more than 10 digits.
